description: Smallest n concatenated with n + d (d = 0,1,2,3,...) is a lucky number.
comments: First terms of sequences A032640-A032649, continued with displacements d > 9.
example: 77th term = 13: 13 + 76 (=77-1) = 89: '13' and '89' = 1389 equals a lucky number.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, May 15 1998
